body.degree: Ph.D. in Systems Innovation and Computational Engineering
body.schoolDescription: Conducting research on adaptive AI frameworks, quantum-inspired optimization models, and integrated cyber-physical systems to solve complex infrastructure challenges. (Cont.)

body.degree: M.Sc. in Computational Systems and Automation
body.schoolDescription: Specialized in intelligent automation networks, predictive analytics, and next-generation control systems for large-scale operations.
Focused on embedded robotics, digital signal processing, and real-time system architecture, graduating with top honors in the faculty.
